ðŸ“– Summary: Enchat is a self-hosted terminal chat application that provides end-to-end encrypted, ephemeral communication. It prioritizes privacy by design, offering features like zero-knowledge architecture, perfect forward secrecy, and Tor support to ensure secure conversations without reliance on centralized servers or data tracking.
